comment.author: 임 정숙
comment.content: I have spent over 10 years working in the IT industry.

comment.author: 임 정숙
comment.content: OR, I have been working in the industry for over 10 years.

comment.author: 임 정숙
comment.content: if it is 5 years and 9 months, I think you could NTO 'about 6years' or 'nearly 6 years'

post.content:
관련분야 경력이 5년9개월일경우 이력서에는 어떻게 적는게 좋을까요?
그냥 5 years experience as ... 라고 적는게 좋을까요?
조언부탁드립니다.
post.title: 이력서작성시 경력관련(문의)
